docs.snippet: LONDON, March 12 -- The Home Office announced tonight that because of military considerations of paramount importance all travel between Britain and any part of Ireland, either north or south, except in a few special categories, will be suspended ...
docs.lead_paragraph: LONDON, March 12 -- The Home Office announced tonight that because of military considerations of paramount importance all travel between Britain and any part of Ireland, either north or south, except in a few special categories, will be suspended indefinitely, beginning tomorrow.

docs.snippet: Armed with restraining orders obtained from Supreme Court justices, the city sought last night to prevent unions representing 60,000 policemen, firemen and other public-safety officers from distributing leaflets warning visitors to stay away from ...
docs.lead_paragraph: Armed with restraining orders obtained from Supreme Court justices, the city sought last night to prevent unions representing 60,000 policemen, firemen and other public-safety officers from distributing leaflets warning visitors to stay away from New York because of crime and violence.
docs.abstract: NYC, armed with restraining order obtained from NYS Sup Ct justices, seeks to prevent unions representing 60,000 policemen, firemen and other public safety employes from distributing 'Fear City' leaflets that warn visitors to stay away from NY because of crime and violence; million copies of pamphlet was scheduled to be handed to visitors by off-duty members of 26 unions, whose leaders have formed Council for Public Safety; union officials say they will hon order; Mayor Beame scores union action; calls it new low in 'irresponsibility'; PBA head Ken McFeeley defends leaflets as making public aware of what will happen if city proceeds with massive layoffs; illus (L)

headline.main: Union 'Guide' to 'Fear City' Is Banned by a Court Order; City Wins Court Ban on Unions' 'Guide' to 'Fear City'

docs.snippet: Anatoly Manakov wants nothing more than to go to Walt Disney World. And Vladimir Mostovets would like very much to visit Detroit.   The trouble is, they are Soviet correspondents. And eager though they might be, the State Department bans them from...
docs.lead_paragraph: Anatoly Manakov wants nothing more than to go to Walt Disney World. And Vladimir Mostovets would like very much to visit Detroit. The trouble is, they are Soviet correspondents. And eager though they might be, the State Department bans them from Disney World and Detroit.

docs.snippet: THE past few days have been rough on the American tourist. First the weather buffeted him with fearful blows, grounding him, his airplane, his train, bus and other wheeled vehicles; even the ships at sea were delayed, and one cruise liner bruised ...
docs.lead_paragraph: THE past few days have been rough on the American tourist. First the weather buffeted him with fearful blows, grounding him, his airplane, his train, bus and other wheeled vehicles; even the ships at sea were delayed, and one cruise liner bruised its bow against a freighter while striking out for southerly waters.
